::FZ::

FZ nods, looking at Vehement.

"I see.." he says, approaching the bot, "Just a tribute or do you 
wish to ally as well?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Vehement/Dark One:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Vehement watched as FZ landed, looking to Dark One.
> 
> "That is our leader." Dark One said, looking to FZ, not knowing 
that wasn't 
> the real Zardus, but Future Zardus.  "Zardus, this is Vehement, 
leader of 
> this ship.  He wishes to negotiate a tribute so he may stay alive."
